title: Adobe Express Guide: Logging into Adobe Express with Okta SSO
content: This is a step-by-step guide for logging into Adobe Express using Okta and Single Sign-On (SSO). Upon completing these steps, you should be successfully signed into your Adobe dashboard, granting you full access to Adobe Express . There is an Okta icon in your Chrome toolbar for quick and easy access to ALL your apps? If you don't see it, click the puzzle piece then click the pin next to Okta Browser plugin. From here you can quickly log in to your account and quick access to ALL your apps!

ancestors.title: Adobe Enterprise Products: Guides for logging into Adobe applications
